definitions: something which causes disgust or severe disappointment

examples.text: the goal was a real sickener for a Linfield defense

shortDefinitions: something which causes disgust or severe disappointment

definitions: a poisonous toadstool with a red cap and a white or cream-colored stem and gills, found commonly in both Eurasia and North America.

notes.text: Genus Russula, family Russulaceae, class Hymenomycetes, in particular R. emetica

shortDefinitions: poisonous toadstool with red cap and white or cream-coloured stem and gills
